result.execSummary:
The defendant Kirk Michael Koob Thrasher was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kirk Michael Koob Thrasher is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Kirk Michael Koob Thrasher was found guilty of Possession of Burglarious Tools [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.12.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

from V.W.C Erin Mulhollam re: restitution information
TOTAL AMOUNT OWED: $20,960.00 joint and several with 14CF184 and 14CF185

4:24  Defendant Kirk Michael Koob Thrasher in court with attorney James H Krave.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Thorie addresses the sentence.. 1 year Pierce County Jail with huber. May serve in Dunn, Barron or Polk if defendant makes the arrangements at no additonal cost to Pierce Co.   Restitution - 30 days for DA to submit. Jail sentence is to begin immediately. DNA sample to be provided.  Judge suggensts that  the jail to release the defendant into Attorney James Krave's custody to return to jail in Menomonie today.  Good Time will apply. Appeal rights are given to the defendant. This jail sentence runs concurrent to the jail sentence now serving in Dunn.
copy given to the DA's office and faxed to Atty Krave's office.
Defendant's PSI and Judgment of Dismissal/Acquittal
Sentencing hearing at 12-29-2015 04:00 pm.

8:38  Defendant Kirk Michael Koob Thrasher in court with attorney James H Krave.  Defendant Kirk Michael Koob Thrasher in custody.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Thorie plead to Ct 2  dism Ct 1. PSI requested  Must provide truthful testimony at trial and coop with any investigation.   Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights form is filed with the court; court reviews with Def  Defendant pleads guilty to Ct 2 of the information.   Facts are correct  COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS  The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guilty of Ct 2 of information.   Dismisses Ct 1.  Court orders PSI.    Thorie asks to have the signature bond reinstated.  Warrant quashed.  Court orders the bond reinstated. As a condition defendant must cooperate with DOC in the preparation of the PSI.    CLERK - add this condition to the bond and have him resign.
Booking Sheet from PCJ

4:14 p.m.  Attorney James H. Krave in court.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Kraves addresses the court.  No success in contacting client.  Thorie requesting bench warrant.  Court authorizes warrant and will sign upon presentation.  Case will stay on trial calendar at this time.
Final pre-trial at 10-19-2015 04:00 pm.

Court grants this requests - none of these defendants are prejudiced by joining these cases.Court orders the joinder and further scheduling will be done.

Information Filed with the Court and a copy is given to the defendant.   Court reads Information to the defendant.  Further reading waived by Krave.    DEF PLEADS NOT GUILTY TO BOTH CHARGES IN THE INFORMATION.

2:3 pm   
Defendant Kirk Michael Koob Thrasher in court with attorney James H. Krave.  Defendant is in custody.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin on all 4 cases.  Koob-Trasher wants a PH today.  Investigator Douglas Ducklow sworn and examined by Wm Thorie.  Witness IDs the defendant.  Record so reflects.  Krave has no questions.  Investigator Collin Gilles sworn and examined by Wm Thorie.  Witness IDs the defendant, Mr. Koob Thrasher.   Krave has no questions and no argument.    The court finds probable cause and binds defendant over for further proceedings.  See JA for new date.
